alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Jefferson; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:40AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Green, Rock, southeastern Dane and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 539 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brooklyn to near Brodhead. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Janesville, Beloit, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Oregon, Jefferson, South Beloit, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, Brodhead, Clinton, Cambridge, Orfordville, Brooklyn, Footville, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Fulton, and Albion. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 151 and 187. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 6 and 29. Interstate 43 between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
